import React from 'react'; import './SaleDetailModal.css'; const SaleDetailModal = ({ sale, onClose }) => { if (!sale) return null; const formatDate = (dateString) => { return new Date(dateString).toLocaleString(); }; const formatCurrency = (amount) => { return `$${parseFloat(amount).toFixed(2)}`; }; return (
e.stopPropagation()}>

Sale Details

{/* Sale Information */}

Sale Information

{sale.sale_number}
{sale.status.charAt(0).toUpperCase() + sale.status.slice(1)}
{formatDate(sale.created_at)}
{sale.sold_by_name || 'Unknown'}
{/* Customer Information */}

Customer Information

{sale.customer_name || 'Walk-in Customer'}
{sale.customer_phone && (
{sale.customer_phone}
)} {sale.customer_email && (
{sale.customer_email}
)}
{/* Sale Items */}

Items ({sale.items?.length || 0})

{sale.items && sale.items.length > 0 ? (
Product
SKU
Qty
Unit Price
Total
{sale.items.map((item, index) => (
{item.product_name}
{item.product_sku}
{item.quantity}
{formatCurrency(item.unit_price)}
{formatCurrency(item.total_price)}
))}
) : (

No items found

)}
{/* Payment Information */}

Payment Summary

{formatCurrency(sale.subtotal)}
{sale.tax_amount > 0 && (
{formatCurrency(sale.tax_amount)}
)} {sale.discount_amount > 0 && (
-{formatCurrency(sale.discount_amount)}
)}
{formatCurrency(sale.total_amount)}
{sale.payment_method.charAt(0).toUpperCase() + sale.payment_method.slice(1)}
{/* Notes */} {sale.notes && (

Notes

{sale.notes}
)}
); }; export default SaleDetailModal;
